TestCase.name: testCreateIfNotExistsTableLike
TestCase.Resource: LogicalTableCreate(TableName=[OUT_TEST], Target Schema=[[CUSTOMER]], IsReplace=[false], CreateTableType=[DEFAULT]) LogicalSort(fetch=[0:BIGINT]) LogicalTableScan(table=[[CATALOG, SALES, EMP]])
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS CUSTOMER.out_test LIKE emp

TestCase.name: testCreateOrReplaceTable
TestCase.Resource: LogicalTableCreate(TableName=[OUT_TEST], Target Schema=[[CUSTOMER]], IsReplace=[true], CreateTableType=[DEFAULT]) LogicalProject(DEPTNO=[$9], EMPNO=[$0]) LogicalJoin(condition=[=($7, $9)], joinType=[inner]) LogicalTableScan(table=[[CATALOG, SALES, EMP]]) LogicalTableScan(table=[[CATALOG, SALES, DEPT]])
CREATE OR REPLACE TABLE CUSTOMER.out_test AS select dept.deptno, emp.empno from emp join dept on emp.deptno = dept.deptno

TestCase.name: testCreateOrReplaceTableLike
TestCase.Resource: LogicalTableCreate(TableName=[OUT_TEST], Target Schema=[[CUSTOMER]], IsReplace=[true], CreateTableType=[DEFAULT]) LogicalSort(fetch=[0:BIGINT]) LogicalTableScan(table=[[CATALOG, SALES, EMP]])
CREATE OR REPLACE TABLE CUSTOMER.out_test LIKE emp

TestCase.name: testCreateTableIfNotExists
TestCase.Resource: LogicalTableCreate(TableName=[OUT_TEST], Target Schema=[[SALES]], IsReplace=[false], CreateTableType=[DEFAULT]) LogicalProject(EMPNO=[$0], ENAME=[$1], JOB=[$2], MGR=[$3], HIREDATE=[$4], SAL=[$5], COMM=[$6], DEPTNO=[$7], SLACKER=[$8]) LogicalTableScan(table=[[CATALOG, SALES, EMP]])
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS out_test AS select * from emp

TestCase.name: testCreateTableLike
TestCase.Resource: LogicalTableCreate(TableName=[OUT_TEST], Target Schema=[[CUSTOMER]], IsReplace=[false], CreateTableType=[DEFAULT]) LogicalSort(fetch=[0:BIGINT]) LogicalTableScan(table=[[CATALOG, SALES, EMP]])

TestCase.name: testCreateTableOrderBy
TestCase.Resource: LogicalTableCreate(TableName=[TESTING_OUTPUT], Target Schema=[[SALES]], IsReplace=[false], CreateTableType=[DEFAULT]) LogicalSort(sort0=[$0], dir0=[ASC]) LogicalProject(P_PARTKEY=[$0]) LogicalValues(tuples=[[{ 'foo' }]])
CREATE TABLE testing_output AS (with part_two as ( select 'foo' as p_partkey from (VALUES (1, 2, 3)) ) select p_partkey from part_two order by p_partkey)

TestCase.name: testCreateTableOrderByExpr
TestCase.Resource: LogicalTableCreate(TableName=[OUT_TEST], Target Schema=[[SALES]], IsReplace=[false], CreateTableType=[DEFAULT]) LogicalProject(EMPNO=[$0]) LogicalSort(sort0=[$1], dir0=[ASC]) LogicalProject(EMPNO=[$0], EXPR$1=[true]) LogicalTableScan(table=[[CATALOG, SALES, EMP]])
CREATE TABLE out_test as select emp.empno from emp order by emp.empno is not null

TestCase.name: testCreateTableRewrite
TestCase.Resource: LogicalTableCreate(TableName=[FOO], Target Schema=[[SALES]], IsReplace=[false], CreateTableType=[DEFAULT]) LogicalSort(fetch=[10]) LogicalProject(DEPTNO=[$0], NAME=[$1]) LogicalTableScan(table=[[CATALOG, SALES, DEPT]])
CREATE TABLE foo as select * from dept limit 10

TestCase.name: testCreateTableSimple
TestCase.Resource: LogicalTableCreate(TableName=[OUT_TEST], Target Schema=[[SALES]], IsReplace=[false], CreateTableType=[DEFAULT]) LogicalProject(EXPR$0=[1], EXPR$1=[2], EXPR$2=[3]) LogicalTableScan(table=[[CATALOG, SALES, EMP]])
CREATE TABLE out_test AS select 1, 2, 3 from emp

TestCase.name: testCreateTableWith
TestCase.Resource: LogicalTableCreate(TableName=[FOO], Target Schema=[[SALES]], IsReplace=[false], CreateTableType=[DEFAULT]) LogicalProject(DEPTNO=[$0], NAME=[$1], DEPTNO0=[$2], NAME0=[$3]) LogicalJoin(condition=[=($0, $2)], joinType=[inner]) LogicalSort(fetch=[10]) LogicalProject(DEPTNO=[$0], NAME=[$1]) LogicalTableScan(table=[[CATALOG, SALES, DEPT]]) LogicalSort(fetch=[10]) LogicalProject(DEPTNO=[$0], NAME=[$1]) LogicalTableScan(table=[[CATALOG, SALES, DEPT]])

CREATE TABLE foo as with temporaryTable as (select * from dept limit 10), temporaryTable2 as (select * from dept limit 10) SELECT * from temporaryTable join temporaryTable2 on temporaryTable.deptno = temporaryTable2.deptno

TestCase.name: testOrderByNoCreateTable
TestCase.Resource: LogicalSort(sort0=[$0], dir0=[ASC]) LogicalProject(P_PARTKEY=[$0]) LogicalValues(tuples=[[{ 'foo' }]])
with part_two as ( select 'foo' as p_partkey from (VALUES (1, 2, 3)) ) select p_partkey from part_two order by p_partkey

TestCase.name: testValueUnreserved
TestCase.Resource: LogicalProject(ENAME=[$1], EXPR$1=[+($0, $2)]) LogicalJoin(condition=[=($2, $0)], joinType=[inner]) LogicalProject(VALUE=[$0]) LogicalTableScan(table=[[CATALOG, SALES, DEPT]]) LogicalProject(ENAME=[$1], VALUE=[$7]) LogicalTableScan(table=[[CATALOG, SALES, EMP]])
SELECT ename, dept2.value + value.value FROM (select deptno as value from dept) dept2 JOIN (select ename, deptno as value from emp) value on value.value = dept2.value

TestCase.name: testValuesUnreserved
TestCase.Resource: LogicalProject(ENAME=[$1], EXPR$1=[+($0, $2)]) LogicalJoin(condition=[=($2, $0)], joinType=[inner]) LogicalProject(VALUES=[$0]) LogicalTableScan(table=[[CATALOG, SALES, DEPT]]) LogicalProject(ENAME=[$1], VALUES=[$7]) LogicalTableScan(table=[[CATALOG, SALES, EMP]])
SELECT ename, dept2.values + values.values FROM (select deptno as values from dept) dept2 JOIN (select ename, deptno as values from emp) values on values.values = dept2.values

TestCase.name: testWithBodoParser
TestCase.Resource: LogicalProject(EXPR$0=[1], EXPR$1=[2], EXPR$2=[3]) LogicalTableScan(table=[[CATALOG, SALES, EMP]])
select 1, 2, 3 from emp
